title: Mkhitaryan: 'Prefer Fonseca's football'

content:
Henrikh Mkhitaryan says he is “feeling much better” at Roma and that he “prefers” Paulo Fonseca’s football to what Unai Emery practiced at Arsenal.
Mkhitaryan fell out of favour at Arsenal but had been hitting form for Roma just before coronavirus brought th… [+2095 chars]
